name: Thumper Mini Pro Massager
descr:
A lot of power in a little package, The MINI PRO2 is a professional strength massager in a personal, self-use size. Using the same patented Thumper percussive action, the MINI PRO2 was designed for those hard to reach areas like the shoulders and mid-back. Weighing only 3 pounds (1.4 kg), the MINI PRO2 has three electronically regulated power settings for use on both thick and thin muscles. ItÂ´s perfect for packing and travel.

While the full size PROFESSIONAL THUMPER is ideal for 2 person use (doctor - patient), the new MINI PRO2 THUMPER is smaller, lighter and designed specifically for self-application. A professional-strength massager in a personal, self-use size.

For those hard-to-reach areas like the shoulders and midback. For those thinner spots or for use on children and the elderly. For easy packing and travel.
